SettingsActivity ListDrinksActivity
disclaimer <--> Disclaimer Please remember that DrinkTracker is only an approximation of your blood alcohol content (BAC), and not a substitute for a breathalyser examination. GlassByte is in no way responsible for any actions carried out under intoxication. Please stay safe under the influence of alcohol. By using this app, you agree to abide by this forewarning. I agree I disagree
dialog warnings <--> Sober. Mildly relaxed and no loss of coordination. Slight impairment, lowered inhibitions, lowered caution, exaggeration of behaviour. Mild impairment of balance, speech, vision and reaction time. Significant impairment of coordination, loss of judgement, and feeling of euphoria. Lack of physical control, loss of balance, and blurring of vision. Reduced euphoria and increased dysphoria. Severe impairment of perception and judgement. Intensifying of dysphoria, increase in nausea, appears "more sloppy". Dazed, confusion, disorientation. May not feel pain if injured. Nausea and vomiting experienced around this level. Gag reflex may be impaired. Blackouts are more likely from this point. Severe impairment of physical and mental functions. Increased risk of asphyxiation by vomiting and injury. Drunken stupor - you have little comprehension of where you are. Passing out and difficulty to be awoken is very likely. Equivalent to surgical level anaesthesia. Onset of coma and possible death due to respiratory arrest.
unit warnings <--> Total units drunk this week: units Below recommended weekly limit. Excessive drinking!
detailed stats <--> Detailed Statistics Average strength of drinks: Average volume of drinks: Alcohol calories this week: Maximum BAC achieved: calories
miscellaneous <--> Current\nBAC:\n Current BAC level: PRESET DRINKS CUSTOM DRINKS Time BAC
Settings <--> Language Options
Irish Language Option Select this option if you wish to use Irish Gaelic as a language option on relaunching the app.
Low German Language Option Select this option if you wish to use Low German as a language option on relaunching the app.

Warning OK You\'re enroute to getting drunk, maybe take it easy if you\'re feeling a bit intoxicated. You\'ve reached quite a drunk stage, watch yourself and make sure you don\'t lose personal belongings. You\'re extremely drunk, drink any more and you\'re endangering yourself! You\'re very drunk and should expect a bad hangover tomorrow morning. DrinkTracker Copyright 2015 GlassByte Limited. GlassByte is a software development start-up company headquartered in Dublin, Ireland. Our small, ambitious team strives to create innovative and useful software for computing platforms. For more apps or business enquiries, visit our website!\nhttp://www.glassbyte.com/
